description.narrative: The development objectives of the project are to assist the Borrower in: (a) reducing industrial pollution in targeted Industrial Enterprises; and (b) strengthening the monitoring and enforcement capabilities of the MOE.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Section I.E.1 | Description :The Borrower shall through MOE in coordination with BDL carry out theProject in accordance with the Project Operational Manual (POM) | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.D | Description :The Borrower shall through the PMU carry out Part B of the Project inaccordance with the provisions of the Environmental and Social Management Framework (ESMF) | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I.A.1 | Description :The MOE shall maintain the PMU throughout the Project implementation |Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section I.A.2 | Description :The Borrower shall through MOE maintain the Project Advisory Committeethroughout the Project implementation | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section II.A.2(a) and 2(b) | Description :Carrying out a mid-term review and preparing of mid-termreview report | Due Date :30-Mar-2017
